jcr:content.jcr:title: Cookie Program Training Hosted by Community 3

data.details:
Come learn about the Cookie Program!! You will receive everything you need to run a successful fundraising campaign.  We will highlight the exciting changes this year and help you prepare for the upcoming cookie season.  You will see this yearâ€™s Girl Rewards, learn about the new Troop Rewards, and be able to sample the cookies.  All Troop Product Sales Managers (cookie moms or dads) and any other interested Volunteers are invited to attend.

Our Cookie Guru training will take place during the first 30 minutes of the program to notify you of the changes this year.  Cookie Gurus are welcome to attend the entire 90 minute training session, but are not required.

Please note: This training is required for any Troop interested in participating in the Cookie Program.  

All communities are welcome to attend any Cookie Program training.

Do you have questions?  Email: gscookies@girlscouts-gateway.org
